name: Golden Ball
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Golden Ball is the next generation BSC token aiming to improve and bring the online betting & gambling transaction system to a decentralized level. Through the GLB token, users will be able to complete faster transactions on betting platforms with lower fees!
